data.eml:eml: A new species of Paratus Simon, 1898 (Araneae: Liocranidae, Paratinae) from India

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sankaran, Pradeep M., Malamel, Jobi J., Joseph, Mathew M., Sebastian, Pothalil A. (2017): A new species of Paratus Simon, 1898 (Araneae: Liocranidae, Paratinae) from India. Zootaxa 4286 (1): 139-144, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4286.1.12
